info.brief_description: A new take on my last version of this story, now including the 2020 show.
info.description:
Turn the girls from the 2020 take on the BSC, or from the book versions into babies, as well as other characters.
Rules.
1: No drugs.
2: No sex scenes, or at least, nothing over the top.
3: No drugs or insulting religion. 5: Have fun.
